name: MTLComputePassDescriptor
desc: A configuration for a compute pass for creating a compute command encoder.

items.name: var dispatchType: MTLDispatchType
items.desc: The strategy to use for dispatching any compute commands encoded in the compute pass.

items.name: var sampleBufferAttachments: MTLComputePassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptorArray
items.desc: The array of sample buffers that the compute pass can access.
